Watch live http://t.co/YjWy4e5I9c: my press conference with @VivianeRedingEU @MalmstromEU for #RuleofLaw & future of #EUJustice #homeAffairs
Important package on future of Justice and #homeAffairs & new framework to strengthen #RuleofLaw  in #EU
We have come a long way. With the Lisbon Treaty, #EUJustice #homeAffairs policies are now central policies of #EU
@EU_Commission has responded effectively and delivered answers to pressing common challenges #RuleofLaw #EUJustice #homeAffairs
Today, we are giving our contribution and vision in the areas of #EUJustice #homeAffairs to the June #euco @EU_Commission
Every time there has been a threat to #RuleofLaw in #EU Member States, all have turned to the @EU_Commission
@EU_Commission has been seen as institution able to apply a legal, objective and non-politicised approach #RuleofLaw #EUJustice #homeAffairs
Before activating the "nuclear option" of Article 7 of #EU Treaty something has been missing #RuleofLaw
#RuleofLaw framework aims at establishing dialogue with the concerned #EU Member State in order to find solutions before article 7 is used
With this new instrument we are reaffirming #RuleofLaw is at heart of our Community of values & @EU_Commission is going to preserve it
